title: Chai-Town - Fresh Brewed [320 MP3 VBR 2012]
description:
Chai-Town is a student run a Cappella group at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in the United States. Because they are all students and do this for fun in their free time, they have a limited budget and can do only so much with their limited assets. However, Chai-Town's album, Fresh Brewed, is hailed as one of the best South Asian A Cappella fusion albums to have ever been released! With their American upbringings and Indian roots, they have created an album that mixes the sounds of the west with the sounds of the east. Check out the songs and see for yourself! 

If you like what they do, support them and buy their tracks from iTunes!

Find them online at the following places:

That vision led to the creation of Chai-Town. Though it is considered a band, Chai-Town is a brotherhood of musicians that entertain their fans as they follow their love of music. For the past decade they have brewed cups of music that were ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Â£Good to the Last DropÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Â¥ and have left their fans saying ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Â£Aaaah ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Âª ArohanamÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Â¥; Yet, overtime, the scent from this Champaign brew emanated throughout the nation as people began to crave the taste of South Asian a cappella. With new arrangements and singers, their ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Â£Fresh BrewedÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Â¥ flavor will never cease to entertain you. Each generation of Chai-Town has always produced a blend for your ear drums to digest so see if you can smell the scent of their newest brew coming to a campus near you.
The 2011-2012 year was the 10 year anniversary of the group. Last year we performed at universities and venues in Iowa, Chicago, and Kansas for a variety of events such as shows and competitions. We also had the pleasure of releasing our 3rd Studio Album, multiple music videos, and being featured in the Times of India! As 2012-2013 year approaches, Chai-Town is excited to see what this year holds!
Chai-Town is a completely student-run, non-profit group of 14 members and many alum, each of whom has a passion for music. We love sharing this passion with our friends and family, our community, and the world.

Check them out on YouTube by searching for "Chai-Town."
